burden of the valley of vision. This prophecy is of judgment that will come against Jerusalem, the city where Isaiah and many of the prophets received divine visions.

What aileth thee now. What is wrong with you that you are climbing to the housetops?

thou art wholly gone up to the housetops. Jerusalem climbed upon the rooftop to mourn (a custom in ancient Israel; 15:3; Jer. 48:38) the loss of her children, who had been carried away into captivity.
